doc.title: The Fly
doc.plot: A man reading. A can of insect spray is nearby. A fly enters the frame. The fly observes that the symbols on the can of insect spray indicate that it does not repel flies. The fly proceeds to harass the man. The man sprays repeatedly at the fly, chasing it back and forth across the frame. The man is reduced to a psychotic wriggling state on the floor. The fly performs one more triumphant fly by.
